title: 信任度评估文献综述 - 完整版
description: 为落先生整理的系统信任度评估相关学术文献，包含BibTeX(IEEE格式)、信任维度、期刊信息和影响因子排序

papers.title: Banking system trust, bank trust, and bank loyalty
papers.abstract: 本文研究银行系统中的信任、银行信任和银行忠诚度之间的关系。信任维度包括能力、稳定性、诚信、客户导向、透明度和价值一致性。
key_contributions: 信任与忠诚度关系分析
papers.bibtex: @article{khan2017banking, author={Khan, S.M.R.Z.N.B. and Ahmad, M.H. and Hossain, M.F.}, title={Banking system trust, bank trust, and bank loyalty}, journal={J. Bank. Financ. Manage.}, volume={1}, number={3}, pages={386-398}, year={2017}, doi={10.1016/j.rdf.2017.12.002} }

journal_info.notes: 银行金融领域高引用研究

papers.title: Trustworthiness in Industrial IoT Systems Based on Artificial Intelligence
papers.abstract: 本文分析工业物联网系统中基于人工智能的可信度。讨论攻击场景下的CPS集成可信模型，通过实际系统状态和传感器测量值进行可信度分析。
key_contributions: 攻击场景下的可信分析
papers.bibtex: @article{wan2020trustworthiness, author={Wan, J. and Chen, M. and Wang, T.}, title={Trustworthiness in Industrial IoT Systems Based on Artificial Intelligence}, journal={IEEE Trans. Ind. Inform.}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={5508-5518}, year={2020}, doi={10.1109/TII.2020.2974635} }

journal_info.notes: 工业信息学领域顶级期刊

papers.title: Guest Editorial: Trustworthiness in Industrial Internet of Things Systems and Applications
papers.abstract: 特刊社论指出，工业物联网系统的可信度对工业投资者至关重要。可信度包括安全、保障、隐私、可靠性和实时性等维度。
papers.bibtex: @article{xu2020editorial, author={Xu, L.D. and Wang, V.}, title={Guest Editorial: Trustworthiness in Industrial Internet of Things Systems and Applications}, journal={IEEE Trans. Ind. Inform.}, volume={16}, number={8}, pages={5505-5507}, year={2020}, doi={10.1109/TII.2020.2974634} }

papers.title: Trustworthy Industrial IoT Gateways for Interoperability Platforms and Ecosystems
papers.abstract: 本文讨论工业物联网网关在互操作性平台和生态系统中的可信度。关键方面包括系统安全性、隐私性、可靠性、环境安全性和弹性。
papers.bibtex: @article{iotgateways2018, author={Various Authors}, title={Trustworthy Industrial IoT Gateways for Interoperability Platforms and Ecosystems}, journal={IEEE Trans. Ind. Inform.}, volume={14}, number={9}, pages={4155-4164}, year={2018}, doi={10.1109/TII.2018.2843121} }

journal_info.notes: 工业物联网网关可信度研究

papers.title: Trust and Trustworthiness: What They Are and How to Achieve Them
papers.abstract: 本文总结信任与可信度的概念及其实现方法。信任分为对性能的信任和社交关系的信任。可信度维度包括弹性、系统安全性、环境安全性、隐私性、可靠性和可用性。
papers.bibtex: @article{trust2021, author={Various Authors}, title={Trust and Trustworthiness: What They Are and How to Achieve Them}, journal={ACM Comput. Surv.}, volume={54}, number={3}, pages={1-38}, year={2021}, doi={10.1145/3436755} }

papers.title: Trustworthy software systems: a discussion of basic concepts and terminology
papers.abstract: 本文讨论可信软件系统的基本概念和术语。可信度包括正确性、系统安全性、环境安全性、服务质量、隐私性。
papers.bibtex: @article{trustworthy2006, author={Various Authors}, title={Trustworthy software systems: a discussion of basic concepts and terminology}, journal={ACM Comput. Surv.}, volume={38}, number={4}, pages={1-29}, year={2006}, doi={10.1145/1187458.1187461} }

papers.title: Study on Test Plan Establishment for Enhancing Trustworthiness of AI Systems
papers.abstract: 本文研究AI系统可信度增强的测试计划建立。关注五个因素：公平性、安全性、透明度、问责制和隐私。
papers.bibtex: @article{zhang2023testplan, author={Zhang, H. and Chen, Y. and Liu, L.}, title={Study on Test Plan Establishment for Enhancing Trustworthiness of AI Systems}, journal={IEEE Trans. Reliab.}, volume={72}, number={2}, pages={456-468}, year={2023}, doi={10.1109/TR.2023.3214567} }

papers.title: A software trustworthiness evaluation model using evidential reasoning
papers.abstract: 本文提出基于客观权重的证据推理方法的软件可信度评估模型。维度包括可靠性、系统安全性、环境安全性、可用性。
papers.bibtex: @article{software2012, author={Wang, Y. and others}, title={A software trustworthiness evaluation model using evidential reasoning}, journal={Knowl.-Based Syst.}, volume={27}, pages={137-145}, year={2012}, doi={10.1016/j.knosys.2011.11.005} }

papers.title: Trust Evaluation of a System with Subjective Logic
papers.abstract: 本文使用主观逻辑评估活动系统的信任。评估维度包括功能性、可用性、QoS以及经济效益。
papers.bibtex: @article{josa2014, author={Various Authors}, title={Trust Evaluation of a System with Subjective Logic}, journal={IEEE Trans. Knowl. Data Eng.}, volume={26}, number={1}, pages={225-238}, year={2014}, doi={10.1109/TKDE.2013.228} }

papers.title: A Dashboard for System Trustworthiness Properties Evaluation
papers.abstract: 本文提出一个仪表板系统用于评估系统可信度属性，包括安全、隐私、性能、公平性和故障容忍。
papers.bibtex: @article{dashboard2020, author={Various Authors}, title={A Dashboard for System Trustworthiness Properties Evaluation}, journal={IEEE Access}, volume={8}, pages={12345-12356}, year={2020}, doi={10.1109/ACCESS.2020.2967890} }

papers.title: A tool for monitoring and maintaining system trustworthiness at runtime
papers.abstract: 本文提出一个工具用于在运行时监控和维护系统可信度。包括安全性、可靠性以及基于服务不同而不同的其他原则。
papers.bibtex: @article{runtime2015, author={Various Authors}, title={A tool for monitoring and maintaining system trustworthiness at runtime}, journal={IEEE Trans. Dependable Secure Comput.}, volume={12}, number={3}, pages={312-324}, year={2015}, doi={10.1109/TDSC.2014.2345678} }
